actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Thursday, December 8, 2022,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Thursday, December 8, 2022, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

S. 5066 (Sen. Murkowski):
        A bill to designate Mount Young in the State of Alaska, and for other purposes.

        -- Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works discharged by Unanimous Consent.

        -- Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

PN2315:
        Tamika R. Montgomery-Reeves, of Delaware, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Third Circuit

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 35. Record Vote Number: 387
Under the authority of the order of today, at  7:00 p.m, the Presiding Officer (Ms. Smith in the chair) declared the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
